attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce Conscription for all persons male and female under the age of 25 for a period of 12 months to be served either before or after higher education as appliable

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Natservice/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
